name: Bubonic Flea
text:
FLIP: Equip this card to a monster on your opponent's side of the field and treat it as an Equip Card. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, the equipped monster loses 500 ATK/DEF, and it is treated as a "Bubonic" monster. 
If a monster(s) is Special Summoned face-down while this card is face-up on the field: Target 1 of those monster(s); Flip that target to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, flip this card to face-down Defense Position.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
